GSD.description:
block: Fix wrong offset in bio_truncate()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.5 by commit 941d5180c430ce5b0f7a3622ef9b76077bfa3d82. For more details please see the references link.
